body: Page 9 was amazing. Loved that Death Note reference there.

I was ship Lelouch and CC at first, but after a closer look I realized that I was interested and felt that Lelouch and Kallen's relationship was more complicated. Aside from being in the same position because of their father's aristocratic background, they don't have the same predictable and simple chemistry as Lelouch and CC or Shirley. Lelouch and Kallen's relationship really reminds me of Eren and Mikasa's relationship, especially the similarities between CG ss2 ep 19 and AOT chapter 112.

I'm pissed this isn't canon.
But hey atleast C.C is still alive.
the cover art was better than the story
This has to be a parallel universe
